name: Drunk Duck
description:
You are a duck and work at a bar. Whenever customers get mad and leave, you become depressed and may start drinking.

Normally you would use WASD to move and SPACE to serve beer to customers, except being drunk makes it hard for you to move and all of your controls are scrambled! 

Serve as many customers as possible without becoming too drunk.

Credit:

Smooth Lovin Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
